title: spotify
intro: As an avid music listener, I have a LOT of Spotify playlists, as I'm sure most people do. When it got to the point of creating a new playlist a month, it started getting pretty hard to distinguish them. I figured I may as well take this as a design challenge and create unique album artwork for each playlist using only colour & typography.

descriptionTexts.descriptionText: Being a Digital Product Designer by day, working on a project that was purely creative / graphic was super enjoyable. Exploring various typographic styles was definitely a highlight, and now it's incredibly satisfying opening my Spotify app to see my designs on display everyday.
Considering I'm completely dependent on my playlists to get me through any day's commute, I'm sure this project will live on forever. Stay tuned.
